mapper.select: SELECT LOG_ID, CALL_TIME, CALLER_NAME, TERMINAL_ID, RESULT_COUNT, INTERFACE_DESC, ORG_ID, ORG_NO, ORG_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NAME, LOGIN_ID, CALL_SUCCESS, PARAM_VARIABLE FROM TB_INTERFACE_LOG WHERE LOG_ID=#{id}

SELECT LOG_ID, CALL_TIME, CALLER_NAME, TERMINAL_ID, RESULT_COUNT, INTERFACE_DESC, ORG_ID, ORG_NO, ORG_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NAME, LOGIN_ID, CALL_SUCCESS, PARAM_VARIABLE FROM ${tableName} WHERE LOG_ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_INTERFACE_LOG( LOG_ID, CALL_TIME, CALLER_NAME, TERMINAL_ID, RESULT_COUNT, INTERFACE_DESC, ORG_ID, ORG_NO, ORG_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NAME, LOGIN_ID, CALL_SUCCESS, PARAM_VARIABLE ) values( #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{callerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultCount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{interfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callSuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramVariable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
